dict.string: We require camera access to facilitate video calls, helping you stay connected with AI bots directly through our app. This feature aims to make your interactions more engaging and personal.

Our app requests access to your files to ensure seamless syncing with cloud services. This enables you to safely store, access, and manage your files across devices, keeping everything you need right at your fingertips.

Our app uses your location to verify if you're within the memorial park to offer you specific services available only there. We respect your privacy, so your location is only checked to enable these services and is never stored or shared.

Our app needs permission to use your microphone to enable voice message features. This allows you to effortlessly send and receive voice messages, making your communication within the app more dynamic and personal.

To personalize your profile with a photo of your choice, our app needs access to your photo library. This permission allows you to upload a profile picture, helping you express your identity and connect more meaningfully with others within the app.
